statements: UPDATE comedy_content SET title='Best Comedy Movie', content='A hilarious film that will make you laugh', publish_date='2022-09-15' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE comedy_content SET type='review', author='John Doe', publish_date='2022-10-01', content='A must-watch funny movie' WHERE title='Super Funny Comedy';
UPDATE comedy_content SET content='Updated content for article', publish_date='2022-08-20' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE comedy_content SET author='John Doe', type='review' WHERE title='Funny Review of the Year';
UPDATE articles SET content = 'Updated content', author = 'John Doe' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE reviews SET rating = 4, reviewer_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE review_id = 2;
UPDATE articles SET title = 'New Title 1', author = 'John Doe' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE reviews SET rating = 5, reviewer_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE review_id = 2;
UPDATE articles SET content = 'New content for article' WHERE title = 'Sample Article';
UPDATE reviews SET review_comment = 'Great article!' WHERE reviewer = 'User123';
UPDATE articles SET content = 'New content for article 1' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE reviews SET rating = 8, review_comment = 'Great article' WHERE review_id = 3;
UPDATE articles SET content = 'Updated content for article 1' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE reviews SET rating = 4, review_date = '2022-01-10' WHERE review_id = 2;

UPDATE reviews SET rating = 4, content = 'Updated review content', review_date = '2022-08-30' WHERE review_id = 5;

UPDATE reviews SET rating=5 WHERE review_id=3;
